title: "Stormy Abstractions"
content: Stormy Abstractions is a website that showcases a unique and captivating interpretation of a thunderstorm through abstract art. Our collection of wallpapers features an array of stunning designs that capture the essence of a storm in a way that is both beautiful and thought-provoking. Each wallpaper is carefully crafted to evoke a sense of energy, power, and movement, drawing you into the storm's raw and unpredictable nature. With Stormy Abstractions, you can add a touch of drama and intrigue to your desktop or mobile device, and experience the beauty of a thunderstorm in a whole new way.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract interpretation of a thunderstorm"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
